issues.description: The no-argument constructor of common Person is declared public in the template but package-private in the solution. Since view and controller code (in de.tum.in.ase.eist.view and controller packages) instantiate Person via `new Person()`, the package-private constructor in the solution will cause a compilation error and block student code from running.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the no-arg constructor in solution common Person to `public Person() {}` so it matches the template and allows instantiation from other packages.
